universal_guidelines: ALWAYS use the 'Outfit' font for headings and 'DM Sans' for body text.
NEVER use pure black (#000000) for cards; use #121212 or glass effects.
Ensure all text on dark backgrounds has sufficient contrast (Text-Primary: #EDEDED).
Use the Gold (#D4AF37) accent sparingly for CTAs and key highlights only.
All interactive elements must have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Mobile-first approach is MANDATORY. Test all layouts on 375px width.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts via Google Fonts import in index.css. 2. Configure tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and font families. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the dark theme background and mobile navigation. 4. Build the 'GlassCard' reusable component first. 5. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
